componentes

Class CountingBloomFilter<E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • componentes.CountingBloomFilter<E>

  • public class CountingBloomFilter<E>
extends java.lang.Object

    Counting Bloom Filter

    An implementation of a data structure that allow us to check if a elements belongs to a set of E. Also makes it possible to count the instances of a certain element. This implementation is based on the classic Counting Bloom Filter, using a bit counters.

        numPositions - Number of positions the bit counter array shall have.
        counterWidth - Width of each bit counter.
        numHashes - Number of hash transforms to be used.

      • calculateOptimalK

        public static int calculateOptimalK(int n,
                                    int m)
        Static method to calculate the optimal k number of hashes transformations for a certain set.
        Parameters:
        n - Number of CBF positions.
        m - Number of set members.
        Returns:
        Optimal value of k hash transformations to use for a certain set.
